snippet: Boston Scientific’s Watchman may not be better than a drug that is used now to prevent strokes, heart-related deaths and blood clots in people with atrial fibrillation in the long term.
abstract: Study finds that Boston Scientific’s stroke prevention device Watchman may not be better than drug now used to prevent strokes, heart-related deaths and blood clots in people with atrial fibrillation in the long term.
lead_paragraph: Boston Scientific’s Watchman may not be better than a drug that is used now to prevent strokes, heart-related deaths and blood clots in people with atrial fibrillation in the long term.

headline.seo: Stroke Prevention Device Misses Key Goal in Study
headline.main: Stroke Prevention Device Misses Key Goal in Study
headline.print_headline: Stroke Prevention Device Misses Key Goal in Study
